column5: Story on the state of the great Lakes. Doesn't look to goodhttp://www.woodstocksentinelreview.com/2012/12/19/great-lakes-stressed-out
Who cares? Soon there wont be water left in them anyway.

Ya the Chinese will own them shortly too !!!! They want to ship tankers full of Great Lakes fresh water !!!! The US Midwest wants it too ..... Lets draw a line in the sand !!!!!..... David Suzuki said 30yrs ago there would be wars fought just over water !! Yup mankind sure is good at ruining everything!!!!  All the years of charter boat fishing out there and what I have seen ..... Bad bad bad .......
It all ends tomorrow, so why worry.LOL
Its already being pipelined from huron to the US midwest. Look at Lake Erie on google maps. It's labelled "quarry"

I just read/glanced at the report on Lake Erie....what a bunch of CRAP...the concerns listed have been the same for the last 30 years and now the fishing is some of the best I have seen in my 55 years of fishing it....EXPLAIN that Buck-O...  Perch, walleye and smallmouth bass fishing in Lake Erie is the best in the WORLD....

X2 been fishing Erie since the late fifties with my Dad, things were really bleak late 60's and 70's, 80's were a decade of rebound  now The smallie perch and pickerel are better than ever. Probably better than Nippissing ever was and in spite of netting too
I wish that Ontario would spend $1 billion to clean up the great lakes. Might not be so hard to find a job in the Environmental industry that way.
And soon it will be nothing but the biggest desert in ontario!
